# CommodityTable.DeleteNamespace method

Deletes a commodity namespace.

```csharp
public void DeleteNamespace(string ns)
```

## Remarks

CAUTION: the underlying routine will also destroy commodities included in the namespace, leaving corresponding managed Commodity objects in an invalid state.
